name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_24Na
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Na" means the element "sodium" and "24Na" is the isotope "sodium-24" with a half-life of 6.27e-01 days.
